page.title: 01Cantley Area(1).
page.content: {12 {Modern Cantley}has grown considerably in the last few years.It now has a library,small shopping precincts,and a Health centre in{Goodison {Boulevard. {Religious building}include{St. {Wilfred's Church}on Church lane,{St. {Paul's Catholic Church}and{Cantley {Methodist Church}on The Boulevard. Warning Tongue Lane partly follows the Roman Road from{Bawtry.On} {Bawtry Road}there are many executive houses which makes it one of Doncasters' most desirable residential areas. A{shopping precinct}is to be found at{Nostell Place.}There is an {Anglican Church}and a{Gospel Hall}on Alston Road and an{Evangelical Church on Bessacarr Lane.
